isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - INSTALL - RANGE CONTROL VALVE

step1.para: Install the O-ring clamp on the gear shift lever.

Install the control valve on the gear shift lever with a clamp, and replace the ball grip on the gear shift lever. Position the top of the control valve button at least six inches below the ball grip ( Figure 186).

figure.caption: Figure 186. Install Control Valve on Gear Shift Lever

step1.para: If air lines are to be replaced, measure the lines and sheathing for correct length.
Install sheathing on the lines and draw under O-ring clamp on the lever.
Connect the black nylon air line to the port marked "OUT" on the control valve and connect the white nylon air line to the port marked "IN" on the control valve ( Figure 187).
Install the black nylon air line from the "OUT" port of the control valve to the air port in the hexagonal end cap of the air valve ( Figure 188).

figure.caption: Figure 188. Install Black Nylon Air Line

step1.para: Install the white nylon air line from the "IN" port of the control valve to the tee in the supply port of the air valve ( Figure 189).

figure.caption: Figure 189. Install White Nylon Air Line
